disabled.description: Set all child components to a disabled state.
disabled.description_zh: 将所有子组件设置为禁用状态。

mandatory.description: Force at least one item to be selected, if available.
mandatory.description_zh: 强制至少选择一个项目（如果可用）。

:max.description: Set the maximum number that can be selected.
:max.description_zh: 设置可以选择的最大数量。

:v-model.description: The value of the component v-mode. If the component supports variants, the default is an empty array.
:v-model.description_zh: 组件 v-mode 的值。如果组件支持多属性，默认为空数组。

multiple.description: Allows you to select multiple options.

selected-class.description: Configure the selected CSS class. This class will be available within the V-Item default scope slot.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置选中的 CSS 类。此类将在 v-item 默认作用域插槽内可用。

tag.description: Specifies the custom tag to be used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定在根元素上使用的自定义标签。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: An event that is raised when a component's model-value changes.
events.description_zh: 当组件的 model-value 更改时引发的事件。

slots.name: default
slots.params:
{
  isSelected: (id: number) => boolean
  select: (id: number, value: boolean) => void
  next: () => void
  prev: () => void
  selected: number[]
}
